FHR.MI.summary: Fabilia Group S.p.A. operates a chain of hotels and resorts in Italy. It has 10 hotels and resorts. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Cervia, Italy.

IGV.MI.summary: iGrandiViaggi S.p.A. engages in the travel and tourism business worldwide. It manages and markets tourist villages through a club formula; operates tours; and provides travel agency services, as well as operates hotels. iGrandiViaggi S.p.A. was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.
